Module pyModbusTCP.server¶

This module provide the ModbusServer class.

class pyModbusTCP.client.ModbusServer¶

class pyModbusTCP.server.ModbusServer(host='localhost', port=502, no_block=False, ipv6=False)¶

Modbus TCP server

__init__(host='localhost', port=502, no_block=False, ipv6=False)¶

Constructor

Modbus server constructor.

Parameters:
  • host (str) – hostname or IPv4/IPv6 address server address (optional)
  • port (int) – TCP port number (optional)
  • no_block (bool) – set no block mode, in this mode start() return (optional)
  • ipv6 (bool) – use ipv6 stack
__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)
